name: Dinner Tonight: Deviled Sardines
description: I’ve been feeling so guilty recently about the plight of salmon and the overfishing of tuna that I’ve kind of sworn off fish for the season. How do you balance the supposed health benefits of a miracle food with the...

recipeInstructions.text: Place one sardine on a piece of toast or a cracker. Sprinkle with a little cayenne and Worcestershire sauce. Then top with the mustard.
